Sentencas: La0.7-xSmx+0.02Ca0.3CrO3-delta(0 <= x <= 0.4) powders with A-site excessive perovskite structure were synthesized by auto-ignition process and characterized.
Titulo: Characterization of A-site excessive perovskite La0.7-xSmx+0.02Ca0.3CrO3-δ

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction (XRD) patterns of samples after sintering at 1400 degrees C for 4 h were indexed as tetragonal structure.
Titulo: Characterization of A-site excessive perovskite La0.7-xSmx+0.02Ca0.3CrO3-δ

Sentencas: The relative densities were all above 96% although decreased slightly with the increasing content of samarium, indicating that the excessive A-site element was helpful to enhance their sinterability.
Titulo: Characterization of A-site excessive perovskite La0.7-xSmx+0.02Ca0.3CrO3-δ

Sentencas: Conductivities of the specimens in air increased with increasing content of samarium.
Titulo: Characterization of A-site excessive perovskite La0.7-xSmx+0.02Ca0.3CrO3-δ

Sentencas: The conductivity of La0.6Sm0.12Ca0.3CrO3-delta was 33.6 S/cm in air at 700 degrees C which wits about 1.7 times as high as that of La0.7Ca0.36CrO3-delta (20.1 S/cm).
Titulo: Characterization of A-site excessive perovskite La0.7-xSmx+0.02Ca0.3CrO3-δ

Sentencas: Average thermal expansion coefficients (TECS) of the specimens increased from 11.06x10(-6) to 12.72x10(-6) K-1 when x increased from 0 to 0.4, and they were close to that of Y doped ZrO2(YSZ).
Titulo: Characterization of A-site excessive perovskite La0.7-xSmx+0.02Ca0.3CrO3-δ

Sentencas: La0.7-xSmx+0.02Ca0.3CrO3-delta(0.1 <= x <= 0.3)were good choices for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs) interconnect materials.
Titulo: Characterization of A-site excessive perovskite La0.7-xSmx+0.02Ca0.3CrO3-δ
